title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr Corris,, Meirionnydd
title.cy: Casgliad o luniau o gangen Merched y Wawr Corris, Meirionnydd.

description.en: Cwmni ‘Noson Lawen MyW Corris a’r Cylch’ ym 1979. Bu’r ‘criw’ yn cynnal nosweithau noson lawen o amgylch yr ardal. Gwelwn: Mary Jones, Menna Thomas, Aranwen Jarman, Dilys McBryde, Alice Hughes, Philly Jones, Blodwen Pugh, Annie Davies, Phena Jones, Gwyneth Morgan, Buddug Davies, Maggie Thomas, Betty Humphries, Gwen Jones, Ellinor Evans, Nia Williams.
description.cy: Cwmni ‘Noson Lawen MyW Corris a’r Cylch’ ym 1979. Bu’r ‘criw’ yn cynnal nosweithau noson lawen o amgylch yr ardal. Gwelwn: Mary Jones, Menna Thomas, Aranwen Jarman, Dilys McBryde, Alice Hughes, Philly Jones, Blodwen Pugh, Annie Davies, Phena Jones, Gwyneth Morgan, Buddug Davies, Maggie Thomas, Betty Humphries, Gwen Jones, Ellinor Evans, Nia Williams.
